FuncDef: The display dldp statistics command displays statistics about DLDPDUs on a specific interface. The display dldp statistics command displays statistics about DLDPDUs on a specific interface.

ParaDef.Info:
Displays statistics about DLDPDUs on a specific port.
If a port is not specified, DLDPDUs on all DLDP-enabled ports are displayed.If a port is specified, DLDPDUs on a specific port are displayed.
-

ExtraInfo: If DLDP negotiation fails, run the display dldp statistics command to view statistics about DLDPDUs. The display dldp statistics command displays statistics about DLDPDUs on a specific interface after the preceding statistics about this interface are cleared using the reset dldp statistics command.
